verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Your name is a strong tower Jesus
To you belong all power Jesus
Whenever I call your name
You always come and make a way
Your name is a strong tower Jesus

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
When we pray in the name of Jesus
Every knee every knee must bow
When we pray in the name of Jesus
Every knee every knee must bow

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Your name is a strong tower Jesus
To you belong all power Jesus
Whenever I call your name
You always come and make a way
Your name is a strong tower Jesus

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
When we call on the name of Jesus
You will come and make a way
When we call on the name of Jesus
You u will come and make a way eh

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines:
Your name is a waymaker Jesus
To you belong all power Jesus all power
Whenever I call your name
You make a way
Your name is a way maker Jesus

verse.name: v1f
verse.lines:
Your name is a bulldozer Jesus
To you belong all power Jesus all power
Whenever I call your name
You make a way
Your name is a way maker Jesus

verse.name: v1g
verse.lines:
Your name is a game changer Jesus
To you belong all power Jesus all power
Whenever I call your name
You make a way
Your name is a way maker Jesus

verse.name: v1h
verse.lines:
Your name is a strong tower Jesus
To you belong all power Jesus all power
Whenever I call your name
You make a way
Your name is a way maker Jesus
